Name: Draft - In the woods
About the game: Draft - In the woods is a casual puzzle game. Your goal is to remove grid nodes using pencil drawn lines. Featuring: Grid movement in turns, you play with the pencil and need to cross a drawn line without colliding with enemy objects such as erasers, erasers or concealers. Solve 30 progressive levels that challenge your ability to memorize patterns. Enemies and power-ups with different mechanics that teach you how they work at each stage. No distractions, put on your headphones and relax in a unique challenge. Original soundtrack , specially composed to keep you focused. No counters or scores, in draft you forget about the world around you and have fun. Can you destroy all the nodes? Give it a try and prove that you are a real Drafter.
